dmx: let me tell you about dmx dmx is probably one of the artists that saved def jam back in the day when def jam was going down and-and he saved def jam with the with the cruddy raps but let me tell you how generous dmx was okay this is when i was producing dmx flew me down to uh l.a. uh-huh when he was shooting a movie and uh we did about four or five tracks but the reason i knew dmx was so big is in the middle of the movie he stopped filming and was like envy lets go uhh fly helicopters. ha ha ha and we went to the store we bought remote control helicopters and started flying helicopters in the middle of the set
